summary: Net refers to interconnected systems or networks, often in digital contexts. It encompasses the idea of dispersed connections across space and time, reflecting the evolution of ecosystems beyond physical boundaries. This concept is particularly relevant in the digital age, where networks play a crucial role in various fields. Net also relates to the design and architecture of decentralized organizations, drawing inspiration from diverse disciplines to create thriving, interconnected systems.
excerpt: The article explores the evolution of ecosystem from biology to broader fields, discussing its expansion beyond physical boundaries in the digital age. It introduces ecosystem architecture as a new approach to designing thriving decentralized organizations.
